details.formulaStrippedArticleTitle: Novel joint time delay and frequency estimation method
details.title: Novel joint time delay and frequency estimation method

kwd: trilinear decomposition-based joint time delay method

details.standardTitle: Novel joint time delay and frequency estimation method
details.abstract: A novel algorithm has been proposed for joint time delay and frequency estimation of sinusoidal signals received at multiple separated sensors. The joint time delay and frequency estimation problem is linked to a trilinear model. Exploiting this link, it derives a trilinear decomposition-based joint time delay and frequency method algorithm. The simulation results reveal that the algorithm performance is close to that of the Cramer-Rao lower bound, and the proposed algorithm even supports small sample sizes.

ieee.displayText: E. H. Sadi, H. Amindavar, "Joint time delay frequency and amplitude estimation using iterative prefiltering method", Information Science Signal Processing and their Applications (ISSPA) 2012 11th International Conference on, pp. 1289-1292, 2012.
ieee.title: Joint time delay, frequency and amplitude estimation using iterative prefiltering method

ieee.displayText: Tong Zhao, Tianyao Huang, "Cramer-Rao lower bounds of joint delay-Doppler estimation for an extended target", Signal and Information Processing (GlobalSIP) 2015 IEEE Global Conference on, pp. 190-194, 2015.
ieee.title: Cramer-Rao lower bounds of joint delay-Doppler estimation for an extended target

ieee.displayText: Mohammadali Ghadiri-Modarres, Mohsen Mojiri, Masoud Karimi-Ghartemani, "New Adaptive Algorithm for Delay Estimation of Sinusoidal Signals With Unknown Frequency", Instrumentation and Measurement IEEE Transactions on, vol. 64, pp. 2360-2366, 2015, ISSN 0018-9456.
ieee.title: New Adaptive Algorithm for Delay Estimation of Sinusoidal Signals With Unknown Frequency

ieee.displayText: Tong Zhao, Tianyao Huang, "Cramer-Rao Lower Bounds for the Joint Delay-Doppler Estimation of an Extended Target", Signal Processing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 64, pp. 1562-1573, 2016, ISSN 1053-587X.
ieee.title: Cramer-Rao Lower Bounds for the Joint Delay-Doppler Estimation of an Extended Target

ieee.displayText: N. Tayem, M. Omer, S.A. Raza, J. Nayfeh, M. El. Lakkis, "Parallel TSQR-TLS and QR-TLS factorization for joint time delay and frequency estimation", Signals Systems and Computers 2013 Asilomar Conference on, pp. 195-199, 2013.
ieee.title: Parallel TSQR-TLS and QR-TLS factorization for joint time delay and frequency estimation
